SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments ---------------------------------------------------------------
! Add read action, URL and username to java arguments
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_PUP_PATH_JAR#" -action ListNodesAction'
! PuppetDB URL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_DB_CONNECTION_URL : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -baseurl &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD#")
! SSL Validation : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_DB_SSL_VALIDATION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -skipvalidation &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! operator : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, ' -operator "~"')
! key : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, ' -key "certname"')
! Filter criteria : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -value &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! read connection timeout and read timeout from vara :SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PRV.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS"
:SET &UC4RB_PUP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "CONNECTION_TIMEOUT") export ENV_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_PUP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#"
:SET &UC4RB_PUP_READ_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "READ_TIMEOUT") export ENV_READ_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_PUP_READ_TIMEOUT#"
! read puppetDB API version from vara :SET &VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.VARA.API_VERSIONS" :SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_APIVERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG#, "DB_API_VERSION") export ENV_DB_API_VERSION="&UC4RB_PUP_DB_APIVERSION#"
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# ! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST NODES ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST NODES ACTION FAILED ********"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
!Publish the list of classes :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_PUP_NODE*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT#,,"WORKFLOW"
: CASE "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST#,,"WORKFLOW" : ENDSWITCH
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST# = "" :ENDIF
